overview: Aidra Fox, a sexy teacher, is busy grading papers at home when there's a knock at the door. Happy for the interruption, she answers with a smile. Jill Kassidy presents her with a cupcake, announcing that she just wanted to bring something to her favorite teacher. When Jade Ksuh arrives to Georgia Jones' house, she's expecting to do tutoring in the kitchen, but she leads her straight to the bedroom. Georgia makes it difficult for her to focus, she can't keep her hands to herself as she touches Jade's arm or picks at her shirt. Lyra Law, a bubbly teacher, is busy grading one of her student's art pictures, Elena Koshka. She can't grade THAT, she's a teacher! It's beautiful, though, and Lyra loves the curves, the eyes, the most beautiful pair of tits she's ever seen...
title: Too Hot For Teacher
